'''Talent Level Increase''' refers to the increase in the level of [[Combat Talents]] due to external factors outside of leveling the Talent such as other Talents, [[Constellations]], or [[Event]] Bonuses.

The maximum potential talent level for [[Elemental Skill]]s and [[Elemental Burst]]s is stated to be 15; however, the highest currently achievable talent levels are 14 for Elemental Skills and Elemental Bursts and 11 for [[Normal Attack]]s.
